definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the female characters of this film are all more initiative and opinionative .
sentences.chinese: 事实上，片中女角都比男角主动和有主见。

sentences.english: This was contrary to Matsuoka's theme.
sentences.chinese: 这是同松冈的主见背道而驰的。

sentences.english: It is about knowing how to stand your ground without being threatening to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 有主见是坚持自己的立场但并不威胁任何人。

sentences.english: She was going to sell the house but had a change of heart at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 她原本是要卖房子的，但在最后一刻，她改了主见。

sentences.english: I am just a pampered Western wuss.
sentences.chinese: 我只是个被娇惯坏了的西方人，一个没有主见的人。

sentences.english: He is a man who has his own judgement, and who can bear heavy responsibilities at critical time.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个有主见的人，一个在关键时刻堪当重任的人。

sentences.english: She's decisive and she knows what she wants.
sentences.chinese: 她很有主见，知道自己想要什么。

sentences.english: On hearing this, I was inspired with a wonderful idea.
sentences.chinese: 当我听到这里，我被激出一个不错的主见。

sentences.english: He is a strong-minded person who can undertake heavy tasks at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个有主见的人，一个在关键时刻堪当重任的人。

sentences.english: Pretty, love freedom, definite view, accommodating.
sentences.chinese: 美丽，爱自由，有主见，随性。

sentences.english: She has no original opinion; she's just his husband's echo.
sentences.chinese: 她没有主见，只是她丈夫的应声虫。

sentences.english: Self-confident entrepreneurs can listen to others without giving up their own point of view.
sentences.chinese: 自信的创业者能倾听别人的意见但不放弃自己的主见。

sentences.english: He a man of set opinions, a man who is capable for responsiblities at critical moment.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个有主见的人，一个在关键时刻堪当重任的人。

sentences.english: As a lady , i don ' t expect my husband doesn ' t have his own idea.
sentences.chinese: 作为一位女士，我并不期望我的丈夫没有自己的主见。

sentences.english: Stand up for yourself, Matt, and don't let him strong-arm you.
sentences.chinese: 你得坚持自己的主见，别让他强迫你。

sentences.english: Doing this just makes you boring and predictable.
sentences.chinese: 没有主见只会让人感觉你这人既没劲又没什么深度。

definition: to work/to handle matters/to have a job
independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
to stop at nothing (idiom)/to dare to do anything
variant of 敢做敢當|敢做敢当[gan3 zuo4 gan3 dang1]
